title: Rapid Fire News: AI voices after death, DOJ investigates Lordstown Motors, COVID adaptation | E1248
description: Jason covers Anthony Bourdain's amazing AI deepfake voice in "roadrunner" & potential startup ideas for the technology (01:49), the investigation into EV startup Lordstown Motors (12:27), and the way businesses are reacting to how COVID is being managed in FL & CA (42:11).
